name: tinplate scrap, sorted to generic market for iron scrap, sorted, pressed | iron scrap, sorted, pressed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22745/documentation

According to Haupt (2018), when tinplate is exported from Switzerland, it mostly enters the recycling without prior detinning. Since the process for de-tinning in Switzerland was unavailable for confidentiality reasons, it was assumed that the full amount of tin plate in Europe gets recycled without prior detinning. This renaming activity therefore converts 'tinplate scrap, sorted' into 'iron scrap, sorted, pressed'.;Literature: Melanie Haupt, Thomas KÃ¤gi, Stefanie Hellweg, 2018, Life cycle inventories of waste management processes., Data in Brief, 19, 1441-1457. DOI: 10.1016/j.dib.2018.05.067

The activity starts with tinplate scrap being available to this activity.

The activity ends with 'iron scrap, sorted, pressed' being available for transportation.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This is a renaming activity, converting 'tinplate scrap, sorted' into 'iron scrap, sorted, pressed'.
